content: hands up by aileen cahill knittingneels com needles 2 5mm dpns or 100cm circular gauge 8 st/13 row = 1 inch yarn about 200m of sock yarn pattern cast on 44 st work 16 row 1x1 rib k1 p1 rib k 1 round plain next round increase 6 st evenly across row about every 7th st 50 st k 6 rounds plain next round increase 6 st evenly across row again about every 8th st 56 st start thumb gusset as follows k 28 st pm m 1 k 1 m 1 pm k to end of round k 1 round plain repeat last two row until there are 19 st for gusset thread these st on to waste yarn on next round cast on 2 st across thumb hole and carry on in the round k 15 rounds or until nearly long enough then work 10 rounds 1x1 rib cast off loosely work thumb as follows pick up thumb st on waste yarn and the 2 st cast on across thumb hole k 1 round plain then work 10 rounds 1x1 rib cast off loosely © aileen cahill 2008
